sentences.en: He frequently painted labourers and barges along the quay of the Seine.
sentences.cn: 他经常画工和驳船码头一带的塞纳河.

sentences.en: Its capital isParis, which is a beautiful city on the River Seine.
sentences.cn: 法国的首都是巴黎, 一座有塞纳河流过的美丽城市.

sentences.en: Jeder hat seine Interesse. Man kann nicht alles ü ber einen Kamm scheren.
sentences.cn: 所有的都通过一把梳子来修剪,一刀切?

sentences.en: On the banks of the Seine or along the green Loire.
sentences.cn: 在塞纳河两岸或是沿着绿色的卢瓦尔河.

sentences.en: Seine Funktion ist Anzeigen und verwirklicht anderen allen Gebrauchsgutwert.
sentences.cn: 它的作用是表现和实现其他一切商品的价值.

sentences.en: Seine River and its branches form the chief commercial waterway of France.
sentences.cn: 塞纳河及其支流构成了法国主要的商业运输水路.

sentences.en: Seine Spring, the long corridor , the great wide vision in green!
sentences.cn: 塞纳春天, 绿色演绎出的长廊大视角!

sentences.en: Sydney Carton crossed the Seine again for the lighter streets.
sentences.cn: 他再度行过了塞纳河,踏入了灯光较为明亮的市街.

sentences.en: The Seine play important role in the naissance and developments of Paris.
sentences.cn: 塞纳河在巴黎的诞生及发展中扮演着重要的角色.

sentences.en: The Seine River divides the city into two parts.
sentences.cn: 塞纳河将该城分为两部分.

sentences.en: This morning, bargemen fished a girl's body out of the Seine.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨, 船员在塞纳河上捞起了一具女尸.

sentences.en: This point of the Seine is dreaded by mariners.
sentences.cn: 塞纳河的这一处是水手们害怕的场所.

sentences.en: Visitors and locals alike meander along the sidewalks of the Seine River.
sentences.cn: 游客与当地人沿着塞纳河岸漫步聊天.

sentences.en: We are sitting in a little coffee shop by the River Seine.
sentences.cn: 我们正坐在塞纳河边的一家小咖啡店里.

trans.tran_en: a large fishing net that hangs vertically in the water by means of floats at the top and weights at the bottom
